prompt.0: Bitte übersetze den folgenden einfachen Text von Englisch nach Deutsch. Bitte stelle keine Gegenfragen und nenne keine Begründungen, sondern gib nur die Übersetzung aus. Beispiele: Englisch = "Mom" -> German = "Mama", Englisch = "nobody" -> German = "niemand", Englisch = "secret agent" -> German = "Geheimagent", Englisch = "mysterious" -> German = "rätselhaft", Englisch = "suspicion" -> German = "Vermutung". Hier ist der Text: "Felix is fed up: Mom is always on the go. But nobody will tell him why that is. For Felix, it's clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his suspicion seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of mom's job. Before they know it, the two are in the middle of their first exciting case as budding secret agents.". source_text.0: Felix is fed up: Mom is always on the go. But nobody will tell him why that is. For Felix, it's clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his suspicion seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of mom's job. Before they know it, the two are in the middle of their first exciting case as budding secret agents.

hypothesis.0: Hier ist der Text: "Felix is fed up: Mama is always on the go. But niemand will tell him why that is. For Felix, it's clear: his Mama is a Geheimagentin. When he receives a rätselhafte letter on his tenth birthday, his Vermutung seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the Geheimnis of mom's job. Before they know it, the two are in the middle of their first exciting case as budding Geheimagenten.

reference_text.0: Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten.
